resources.string: This is a place where we can put the rules for Find 6. Something like:

• Keep drawing cards until you have a set that totals 6.
• When you find 6, pass the phone to the next player. 
• When the cards run out, the person holding the phone is out. 
• Keep playing until there is only one player left; that person wins
Connect to the Center web site with ideas for how to use this game; other games to play; explain the math behind the game.
